dcterms:description: The AFDB dataset is used for detecting atrial fibrillation, providing segments of ECG recordings for model training and testing.
dcterms:title: AFDB (MIT-BIH Atrial Fibrillation Database)

dcterms:description: The MITDB dataset is utilized for detecting morphological arrhythmias, containing annotated ECG recordings for various heartbeat types.
dcterms:title: MITDB (MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Database)

dcterms:description: The PhysioNet/CinC Challenge 2017 dataset is used for AF classification from short single lead ECG recordings.
dcterms:title: PhysioNet/CinC Challenge 2017 Dataset

dcterms:description: The China Physiological Signal Challenge 2018 dataset is an open access database for evaluating algorithms of ECG rhythm and morphology abnormality detection.
